remarks.format: ## Remarks 回发期间调用方法。The method is called during postback. 一个适配器可以选择对事件进行处理。An adapter can choose to handle the event. 类并不处理回发事件，并始终返回`false`。The class does not handle the postback event and always returns `false`.

para.span: 在重写方法在派生类中，如果你希望你页适配器处理回发事件，返回之后处理事件。

span.span: When overriding the method in a derived class, if you want your page adapter to handle the postback event, return after handling the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 某些设备就能够链接或按钮仅执行回发事件。Some devices are able to execute a postback event on a link or button only. 方法将写入包含的所有信息所需处理窗体和更新，显示的页面的 URL 的链接。The method writes a link with a URL that contains all of the information that is required to process the form and to update and display the page.
